about.title: About the Company
about.subtitle: Led by Adi and Shira, A&S UZAN GROUP combines engineering precision, architectural excellence, and international experience to deliver world-class results.
about.adiBio: Born in 1997, Adi is a Civil Engineering graduate with over 10 years of hands-on experience in the construction industry. He has worked with leading companies, managing diverse projects from residential buildings to large-scale infrastructure. Adi specializes in site management, safety supervision, and integrating innovative construction methods. Passionate about architecture and engineering from a young age, he is committed to delivering projects with reliability, precision, and international standards.
about.visionText: To set new standards in construction and architecture — through trust, innovation, and a relentless pursuit of perfection.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This website (https://uzan-group.com) is operated by A&S UZAN GROUP CO., LTD ('the Company', 'we', 'our'). We are dedicated to safeguarding your personal data in compliance with Thailand’s Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) and global privacy standards.

1.title: 1. Data Collection
content: We may collect personal details such as full name, phone number, email, and messages submitted through contact forms.
Technical data such as IP address, device type, browser, and cookies may also be collected for analytics and optimization.

2.title: 2. Purpose of Data Use
content: To operate, improve, and secure our website; respond to inquiries; provide services; share updates (with consent); and comply with legal obligations.
All data processing is handled lawfully, transparently, and securely under the PDPA.

3.title: 3. Data Retention
content: Your data is securely stored in Thailand or in jurisdictions offering equivalent data protection standards.
We maintain strong security measures including encryption, controlled access, and regular backups.

4.title: 4. Sharing Data with Third Parties
content: We may share information with service providers (hosting, maintenance, security, analytics) under strict confidentiality obligations.
Data may also be disclosed when legally required or upon court order.

5.title: 5. Your Rights
content: Under Thailand’s PDPA, you have the right to access, correct, delete, object to processing, and request data portability.
For inquiries or requests, please contact: info@uzan-group.com
